subject: Re: Order #SSN4815 confirmed
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

After 4 days I received no further information about my purchase. With this
email I would like to ask for a status update since most of the time 4 days
were enough for any of my previous orders on the internet to at least start
he transit.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nagy Gergely,     Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping.
